upload-form.detected-furniture: We have detected furniture in your image. Do you want to remove it?
upload-form.token-error: No access token provided. Please check your access link.
upload-form.invalid-token: Your access token is no longer valid. Please request a new one.
upload-form.missing-token: There's an issue with your access. Please try reloading the page.
upload-form.upload-limit-reached: You have reached your upload limit.
upload-form.uploads-status: You have %1$s upload%2$s remaining out of %3$s.
upload-form.limit-breached: You've reached the maximum number of uploads for now. Please try again later.
upload-form.missing-image: Please select an image before proceeding.
upload-form.upload-error: We couldn't upload your image at this time. Please try again or use a different image.
upload-form.render-error: We're having trouble processing your image right now. Please try again in a few moments.
upload-form.select-room-style: Please select both room type and furniture style.
upload-form.contact-support: If this problem persists, please contact our support team.
upload-form.token-status-error: An error occurred while checking your token status. Please try again later.
